seo.title: AG Fencing LLC
seo.description: AG Fencing LLC is a fencing and deck construction company based in Glen Burnie, MD. We specialize in crafting stunning outdoor spaces that seamlessly blend with the natural beauty of your surroundings. Our website is more than just a showcase of our work, it is a gateway to your perfect outdoor sanctuary.
seo.keywords: fence, deck, outdoor, construction, fencing, deck construction, fence installation, deck installation, fence repair, deck repair, fence restoration, deck restoration, Glen Burnie, MD, Maryland

hero.title: Fence Builder, Deck & Outdoor
hero.subtitle: Work Together
hero.description: We specialize in crafting stunning outdoor spaces that seamlessly blend with the natural beauty of your surroundings. Our website is more than just a showcase of our work, it is a gateway to your perfect outdoor sanctuary.
hero.subDescription: You're greeted by a captivating image of a beautifully designed deck nestled amidst lush greenery and bathed in warm sunlight.

intro.title: Trusted Fencing Professionals
intro.subtitle: Our Introduction
intro.description: Our 8 years of experience has allowed us to perfect our craftsmanship in fence installation. Each project is handled with precision and care, guaranteeing exceptional results.
intro.secondDescription: Looking to bring life to your outdoor space? In addition to fencing, AG Fencing LLC specializes in deck construction. We design and build beautiful terraces that adapt to your needs and style.

fence.title: Fence
fence.description: Whether you're looking for a traditional wood fence that brings warmth and rustic charm to your home, a low-maintenance vinyl fence that maintains its appearance for years, or an aluminum fence that combines durability with elegance, we're ready to design, build and install the perfect fence for you.

deck.title: Deck
deck.description: We offer a wide range of material options, including natural wood, composite wood, vinyl and more, to meet your preferences and maintenance needs. Whether you want a spacious deck for social gatherings, an elevated deck with panoramic views, or an intimate deck for relaxing, our team of deck builders will handle every aspect of the project, from planning to construction, to ensure you get an outdoor space that complements your lifestyle and enhances the beauty of your property.

interior.title: Interior Remodelation
interior.description: Our team of highly trained and experienced professionals is dedicated to providing you with superior results on every project, whether we are building a fence, a deck, or carrying out renovations. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we work tirelessly to ensure that every aspect of our services reflects our commitment to quality and professionalism.

exterior.title: Exterior Remodelation
exterior.description: Our team of highly trained and experienced professionals is dedicated to providing you with superior results on every project, whether we are building a fence, a deck, or carrying out renovations. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we work tirelessly to ensure that every aspect of our services reflects our commitment to quality and professionalism.

companyInfo.title: AG Fencing LLC
companyInfo.description: Learn about our journey, values, and the passionate team behind AG Fencing. Our commitment is to deliver extraordinary services.

workHours.title: Monday to Sunday
workHours.description: We are there for you 24/7. Even if your fence needs immediate attention on a Sunday or you just have a question, we're here to help. We're a business that works with you to transform your visions into reality.

location.title: Glen Burnie, MD 21061
location.description: In order to maintain the charm of the nature of your home, we are ready to reach the far-reaching areas to extend our services. Our staff travels to meet the demands of every inch of your property.

serviceArea.title: We Cover 100 Miles
serviceArea.description: Quality, customer satisfaction, and innovative ideas are our objectives. At AG Fencing LLC, we are committed to deliver your expectations on every project at locations spread across a 100-mile radius.

estimates.title: FREE Estimates!
estimates.description: At AG Fencing LLC, we provide free estimates to give you the right advice concerning the best materials and a reliable cost estimate that meets your needs to the fullest.
